nodes.id: 耶拿市弗里德里希·席勒大学

zh-cn: 耶拿市弗里德里希·席勒大学

description.zh-cn: 位于德国图林根州耶拿的一所公立大学。
description.en: A public university located in Jena, Thuringia, Germany.

description.zh-cn: 德国诗人、哲学家、历史学家和剧作家。耶拿大学以其命名，他亦曾在此担任哲学教授。
description.en: German poet, philosopher, historian, and playwright. The University of Jena is named after him, and he also served as a professor of philosophy there.

description.zh-cn: 德国作家、科学家及思想家。曾在耶拿大学任教并担任校长。
description.en: German writer, scientist, and statesman. He taught at and served as the head of the University of Jena.

description.zh-cn: 德国哲学家，德国唯心主义的代表人物之一。曾在耶拿大学任教。
description.en: German philosopher and a main figure of German idealism. He taught at the University of Jena.

description.zh-cn: 德国哲学家，德国唯心主义的主要创始人之一。曾在耶拿大学任教。
description.en: German philosopher and a founding figure of the philosophical movement known as German idealism. He taught at the University of Jena.

description.zh-cn: 德国哲学家，德国唯心主义的集大成者。曾在耶拿大学获得博士学位并担任教授。
description.en: German philosopher and a major figure in German idealism. He obtained his doctorate and served as a professor at the University of Jena.

description.zh-cn: 德国政治学家，曾任耶拿大学校长。
description.en: German political scientist and former rector of the University of Jena.

description.zh-cn: 中欧的联邦议会共和制国家。
description.en: A federal parliamentary republic in Central Europe.

description.zh-cn: 德国图林根州的一座大学城。
description.en: A university city in Thuringia, Germany.

description.zh-cn: 德国的一个联邦州。
description.en: A federal state of Germany.

description.zh-cn: 一个由欧洲历史悠久、声誉卓著的综合性大学组成的联盟。
description.en: An association of long-established, prestigious European multidisciplinary universities.

description.zh-cn: 代表欧洲高等教育机构的组织。
description.en: An organization representing higher education institutions in Europe.

relationships.source: 耶拿市弗里德里希·席勒大学

description.zh-cn: 耶拿大学的当代命名源自其前任教授弗里德里希·席勒之名。
description.en: The university's modern name is derived from its former professor, Friedrich Schiller.

relationships.target: 耶拿市弗里德里希·席勒大学

description.zh-cn: 弗里德里希·席勒曾在耶拿大学担任哲学教授。
description.en: Friedrich Schiller served as a professor of philosophy at the University of Jena.

relationships.target: 耶拿市弗里德里希·席勒大学

description.zh-cn: 歌德曾于耶拿大学任教并担任校长。
description.en: Goethe taught at and served as the rector of the University of Jena.

relationships.target: 耶拿市弗里德里希·席勒大学

description.zh-cn: 弗里德里希·谢林曾在耶拿大学任教。
description.en: Friedrich Schelling taught at the University of Jena.

relationships.target: 耶拿市弗里德里希·席勒大学

description.zh-cn: 约翰·戈特利布·费希特曾在耶拿大学任教。
description.en: Johann Gottlieb Fichte taught at the University of Jena.

relationships.target: 耶拿市弗里德里希·席勒大学

description.zh-cn: 1801年，黑格尔在耶拿大学取得博士学位。
description.en: In 1801, Hegel obtained his doctorate from the University of Jena.

relationships.target: 耶拿市弗里德里希·席勒大学

description.zh-cn: 1801年成为讲师，1805年成为耶拿大学的正式教授。
description.en: Became a lecturer in 1801 and a full professor at the University of Jena in 1805.

relationships.target: 耶拿市弗里德里希·席勒大学

description.zh-cn: 根据文本，截至2005年，Klaus Dicke为该校第317届校长。
description.en: According to the text, as of 2005, Klaus Dicke served as the 317th rector of the university.

relationships.source: 耶拿市弗里德里希·席勒大学

description.zh-cn: 耶拿大学是科英布拉集团的成员。
description.en: The University of Jena is a member of the Coimbra Group.

relationships.source: 耶拿市弗里德里希·席勒大学

description.zh-cn: 耶拿大学是欧洲大学协会的成员。
description.en: The University of Jena is a member of the European University Association.
